talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>OK then, let me just make sure you have
everything I'll need...
talk0027:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I don't think I can use the shield or the
scimitar when they are in this state...
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>I poured all of my heart into making these.<sp:5:0:0>


Here, take them. They are a true symbol
of the gratitude of the Gerudo.
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Four diamonds, 10 pieces of flint...
a Gerudo scimitar, and a Gerudo shield.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Hee-hee! I knew you could do it. This is
everything I need to get to work!<sp:5:1:0>

Give me just a minute...
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It's very important that the materials not
have any extra things attached to them.

I'm not trying to be difficult—this is just
the reality of the situation.

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Oh, and if you're worried about losing
whatever is attached...<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0700>You should head to <clr:0000>Tarrey Town<clr:ffff> in
northeast Hyrule.

I hear there's an expert there who has
specialized in removing attachments
and adornments.
They may be able to help you out.
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>You're the second person I've made those
for.<sp:5:1:0> Lady Riju was the first.

My ancestor even made them for the
Champion of the Gerudo some time ago.<sp:5:1:0>

<sp:3:0:2:0100>That really just goes to show how amazing
they are. It'll make me happy if you take
good care of them.
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_01>But I did make them to be used, so don't
feel like you need to preserve them...<sp:5:1:0>

Should they ever be irretrievably lost,
just bring me the materials again and
I'll remake them for you.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>And...also...


You can come and see me whenever you
like, even if you don't need anything.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>May the blessings of the Gerudo be
upon you...
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>You're not just my savior—you're the
savior of all of the Gerudo.

It would be an honor to make the <clr:0000>arms
of the Seven<clr:ffff> for you.
talk0007: <sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy_01>I wish you good fortune in your travels...
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Not a problem. It's entirely up to you if
you want me to make these weapons.
Let me know if you change your mind.
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>That's the spirit!


OK then, I just need you to gather some
materials for me. Can you do that?

Truth be told, I'd like to gather the
materials for you myself, but it is the duty
of the bearer of the arms to do that.
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>I need four diamonds, 10 pieces of flint...
a Gerudo scimitar, and a Gerudo shield.

Even a decayed Gerudo scimitar will do
the trick!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>OK then...<sp:5:0:0>once you've gathered all of
those materials together, come and talk
to me, OK?
talk0021:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>If you hadn't shown up when you did,
I wouldn't be here right now.

With me gone, the long line of those
who are capable of crafting the <clr:0000>arms of
the Seven<clr:ffff> would have ended too.
The arms of the Seven... A legendary
sword and shield passed down among the
Gerudo, wielded by a chosen individual.
<sp:3:0:2:0100>I'm talking about a shield called the
<clr:0000>Daybreaker<clr:ffff> and a sword known as the
<clr:0000>Scimitar of the Seven<clr:ffff>.
And...after what you did to help me,
I have chosen you to carry the <clr:0000>arms of
the Seven<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Now, would you allow me to make them
for you?
talk0022:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm always shocked when I speak with
the others about you. It's a real sa'oten—
a surprise—how incredible you are.
Sarqso for not only helping Gerudo Town
but also for helping me.

If not for you, my people may have forever
lost the knowledge of how to make the
<clr:0000>arms of the Seven<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>They are a legendary sword and shield
passed down among the Gerudo, wielded
by a chosen individual.
<sp:3:0:2:0100>I'm talking about a shield called the
<clr:0000>Daybreaker<clr:ffff> and a sword known as the
<clr:0000>Scimitar of the Seven<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>I have chosen you to carry the <clr:0000>arms of
the Seven<clr:ffff>.

Would you allow me to make these
legendary items for you?
talk0023:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Everyone, including me, has been able to
get back to our normal lives.

And it's all because of you! <sp:5:0:0>Sarqso!


<sp:3:0:2:0701>You know...<sp:5:1:0>we all owe you a great debt,
and I think I can begin to repay it by
crafting the <clr:0000>arms of the Seven<clr:ffff> for you.
They are a sword and shield passed down
by the Gerudo, and they can only be
wielded by a chosen individual.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><clr:0000><snd:Happy_01><clr:ffff>I'm talking about the <clr:0000>Scimitar of the
Seven <clr:ffff>and the <clr:0000>Daybreaker<clr:ffff>, of course.

They're crafted using a special technique
known only to me.

<sp:3:0:2:0801>And I...<sp:5:0:0>have chosen you to carry them.
Will you let me make the <clr:0000>arms of the
Seven<clr:ffff> for you?
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>I need four diamonds, 10 pieces of flint...
a Gerudo scimitar, and a Gerudo shield.

Even a decayed Gerudo scimitar will do
the trick!

Truth be told, it's a bit of a pain to gather
the materials, but...

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>I know you can do it.<sp:5:0:0> You're the voe
I chose, after all.
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Oh. <sp:5:0:0>Hmm.<sp:5:0:0> Well, you've brought me
enough materials, but...
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_00>Oh my...<sp:5:0:0> What a nice thing to say!


Well, I'm happy to see you too!
You're vasaaq anytime.
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I don't think I can use the shield when it's
in this state...
talk0013:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00>Oh my... It looks like you don't have all
the materials I need to get to work.

<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>I need four diamonds, 10 pieces of flint...
a Gerudo scimitar, and a Gerudo shield.

Even a decayed Gerudo scimitar will do
the trick!

<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Think_01>Truth be told, I'd like to gather the
materials for you, but it is the duty of
the bearer of the arms to do that.
I'm sure it's a bit of a pain to do it, but...


<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>I know you can do it.<sp:5:0:0> You're the voe
I chose, after all.
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I don't think I can use the scimitar when
it's in this state...
